mapper.insert: insert into review ( title, preview, content, userid, pointid ) values ( #{title}, #{preview}, #{content}, #{userID}, #{pointID} )
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEWID,TITLE,PREVIEW,CONTENT,DATE,R.USERID,COUNTRY,POINTID FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN USER U ON R.USERID = U.USERID WHERE REVIEWID = #{reviewID}
SELECT CEILING(COUNT(*)/5) FROM REVIEW WHERE POINTID = #{pid}
